name: Tilraun
description:
Protect your ball 

Objective: 

  •  Safeguard your ball from the bottom wall and specific debris by using the paddle
  • Survive as long as you can
  • Grab the green object by hitting it with your ball to get the additional health point
  • Beat the boss

 This is my first game released here. My feelings are fragile but it's ok, you can critique the game. I will wipe my tears and take it.

But in all seriousness, I hope you find this mini-game enjoyable. Your feedback would be greatly appreciated.
